En attente d'un partenaire de duel
Espera a un compañero de duelo
Fordere einen PlayStation®Home-Benutzer zum Duell heraus.
Sfida a duello un utente di PlayStation®Home
Reta a un duelo a un usuario de PlayStation®Home
PlayStation®Home 유저 친구를 상대로 결투를 벌이세요
Apprendre à se battre en duel
Aprende cómo retar a un duelo

Challenge a friend to a duel and you will be positioned back to back.
A meter will appear and each player must stop the bar as high up the meter as they can, as quickly as possible!
Once both players have set their power, the duel will play out.
The player who stopped the pointer nearest the top in the fastest time will shoot the other player and win the duel!

Provoquez un ami en duel pour être placés dos à dos.
Une jauge apparaît, et chaque joueur doit l'arrêter le plus haut et le plus vite possible.
Une fois la puissance du tir réglée pour les deux joueurs, le duel se déroule.
Le joueur ayant arrêté le curseur le plus près du sommet et le plus vite possible tire sur son adversaire et remporte le duel!

Fordere einen Freund zum Duell heraus. Ihr werdet Rücken and Rücken positioniert.
Eine Anzeige erscheint und jeder Spieler muss den Balken so weit oben wie möglich anhalten – und das schnellstmöglich!
Wenn beide Spieler ihre Kraft eingestellt haben, kommt es zum Duell.
Der Spieler, der die Nadel am schnellsten und am weitesten oben angehalten hat, gewinnt das Duell!

Sfida a duello un amico e sarete posizionati l'uno alle spalle dell'altro.
Apparirà un metro e ogni giocatore dovrà fermare la barretta nel punto più in alto del metro e il prima possibile!
Una volta che entrambi i giocatori avranno impostato la loro potenza, il duello avrà luogo.
Il giocatore che ha fermato l'indicatore nella parte più alta e nel minor tempo possibile sparerà all'avversario e vincerà il duello!

Desafía a un amigo a un duelo y os posicionaréis espalda contra espalda.
Aparecerá un medidor y cada jugador tendrá que detener la barra en la posición más alta posible.
Cuando ambos jugadores hayan ajustado la potencia, comenzará el duelo.
El jugador que haya detenido el puntero más cerca de la parte superior en menos tiempo, disparará al otro jugador y ganará el duelo.

Challenge a friend to a duel and you will be positioned back to back.
A meter will appear and each player must stop the bar as high up the meter as they can, as quickly as possible!
Once both players have set their power, the duel will play out.
The player who stopped the pointer nearest the top in the fastest time will shoot the other player and win the duel!

친구에게 결투를 신청하면 서로 등을 맞대고 시작합니다.
미터기가 등장하면 각 플레이어들은 최대한 빠르게, 가장 높은 지점에서 막대를 멈춰야합니다!
두 플레이어 모두가 파워를 설정하면 결투가 시작됩니다.
상대방보다 빠른 시간 안에 꼭대기 근처에 막대를 멈춘 사람이 상대방을 쏘고 결투에서 승리합니다!

Challenge a friend to a duel and you will be positioned back to back.
A meter will appear and each player must stop the bar as high up the meter as they can, as quickly as possible!
Once both players have set their power, the duel will play out.
The player who stopped the pointer nearest the top in the fastest time will shoot the other player and win the duel!

向朋友提出決鬥，然後系統會讓你們背對背站立。
力量指標出現後，每位玩家要運用最短時間試著把指標停在最高的位置上！
當兩位玩家設定好力量，便會開始決鬥。
在最短時間內把指標停在最接近頂點的玩家會射擊另一位玩家並贏得決鬥。

向朋友提出決鬥，然後系統會讓你們背對背站立。
力量指標出現後，每位玩家要運用最短時間試著把指標停在最高的位置上！
當兩位玩家設定好力量，便會開始決鬥。
在最短時間內把指標停在最接近頂點的玩家會射擊另一位玩家並贏得決鬥。

Challenge a friend to a duel and you will be positioned back to back.
A meter will appear and each player must stop the bar as high up the meter as they can, as quickly as possible!
Once both players have set their power, the duel will play out.
The player who stopped the pointer nearest the top in the fastest time will shoot the other player and win the duel!
Dance with a fellow PlayStation®Home user
Danser avec un utilisateur de PlayStation®Home
Fordere einen PlayStation®Home-Benutzer zum Tanz auf.
Balla con un utente di PlayStation®Home
Baila con un usuario de PlayStation®Home
Dance with a fellow PlayStation®Home user
Dance with a fellow PlayStation®Home user
Dance with a fellow PlayStation®Home user
Start a regency dance with your partner.\nTake it in turns choosing the move you wish to perform (move, spin, rotate etc).\nOnce each player has performed 3 moves the dance will end.

Commencez à danser le quadrille avec votre partenaire.\nChacun votre tour, choisissez un pas à exécuter (se déplacer, tourner, pivoter, etc.).\nUne fois que chaque joueur a effectué trois pas, la danse prend fin.

Tanze mit deinem Partner einen Regency-Tanz.\nTut dies abwechselnd und wählt die gewünschte Bewegung (bewegen, drehen, kreisen etc).\nSobald ein Spieler drei Bewegungen ausgeführt hat, endet der Tanz.
Inizia un ballo di reggenza con il tuo partner.\nEseguilo a turni, scegliendo la mossa che vuoi compiere (muovi, piroetta, ruota, ecc).\nIl ballo termina quando ogni giocatore ha compiuto 3 mosse.

Comienza un baile de la Regencia con tu compañero.\nTurnaos para elegir los movimientos a realizar (moverse, girar, rotar etc).\nCuando cada jugador haya realizado tres movimientos, terminará el baile.
Start a regency dance with your partner.\nTake it in turns choosing the move you wish to perform (move, spin, rotate etc).\nOnce each player has performed 3 moves the dance will end.
본인의 파트너와 중세 댄스를 시작하세요.\n차례로 원하는 동작(이동, 돌기, 회전, 기타)을 선택합니다.\n각 플레이어가 3번의 동작을 완료하면 춤이 종료됩니다.
Start a regency dance with your partner.\nTake it in turns choosing the move you wish to perform (move, spin, rotate etc).\nOnce each player has performed 3 moves the dance will end.
和你的舞伴跳英國鄉村舞。\n輪流選擇想跳的舞步(移動、旋轉、轉動等)\n當每位玩家各完成3次舞步，舞蹈便會結束。
和你的舞伴跳英國鄉村舞。\n輪流選擇想跳的舞步(移動、旋轉、轉動等)\n當每位玩家各完成3次舞步，舞蹈便會結束。
Start a regency dance with your partner.\nTake it in turns choosing the move you wish to perform (move, spin, rotate etc).\nOnce each player has performed 3 moves the dance will end.

和PlayStation®Home一同參與時尚列隊問答遊戲。
和PlayStation®Home一同參與時尚列隊問答遊戲。
Participate in a fashion parade with fellow PlayStation®Home users

Players take it in turns to ask the judge a question.
The judge receives all these questions and answers them by selecting the player which they think best suits the question.
The judge's winner performs a bow and the round ends.
After each round players take it in turns playing the role of the judge.
The game is over once everyone has had a turn at being the judge.

Les joueurs posent une question au juge chacun leur tour.
Le juge reçoit toutes ces questions et y répond en sélectionnant le joueur correspondant le mieux à la question.
Le vainqueur désigné par le juge fait une révérence, et la manche prend fin.
Après chaque manche, les joueurs prennent un à un la place du juge.
La partie se termine lorsque chaque joueur a été juge une fois.

Die Spieler wechseln sich damit ab, dem Juror eine Frage zu stellen.
Der Juror erhält alle Fragen und beantwortet sie, indem er den Spieler auswählt, von dem er denkt, dass er die Antwort weiß.
Der Gewinner des Jurors macht eine Verbeugung und die Runde ist vorbei.
Nach jeder Runde übernimmt abwechselnd ein anderer Spieler die Rolle des Jurors.
Das Spiel ist vorbei, sobald alle Spieler einmal Juror gewesen sind.

I giocatori fanno a turno una domanda al giudice.
Il giudice riceve tutte queste domande e risponde selezionando il giocatore che pensa sia più adatto alla domanda.
Il vincitore scelto dal giudice compie un inchino e il round finisce.
Il ruolo del giudice è ricoperto da un giocatore diverso round dopo round.
La partita termina una volta che ognuno ha compiuto un turno nei panni del giudice.

Los jugadores se turnan para preguntarle algo al juez.
El juez recibe todas estas preguntas y las responde seleccionando al jugador que crea que le va más la pregunta.
El ganador realiza un reverencia y termina la ronda.
Los jugadores se turnan cada ronda para realizar el papel de juez.
El juego termina cuando todos han sido jueces un turno.

Players take it in turns to ask the judge a question.
The judge receives all these questions and answers them by selecting the player which they think best suits the question.
The judge's winner performs a bow and the round ends.
After each round players take it in turns playing the role of the judge.
The game is over once everyone has had a turn at being the judge.

플레이어들은 차례로 심사위원에게 질문을 할 수 있습니다.
심사위원은 질문을 받으면 해당하는 질문에 대한 가장 적합한 플레이어를 선정하여 대답합니다.
우승자는 인사를 하고 라운드는 종료됩니다.
각 라운드가 종료되면 다른 플레이어가 심사위원을 맡게 됩니다.
모든 플레이어가 심사위원을 하며 게임이 끝납니다.

Players take it in turns to ask the judge a question.
The judge receives all these questions and answers them by selecting the player which they think best suits the question.
The judge's winner performs a bow and the round ends.
After each round players take it in turns playing the role of the judge.
The game is over once everyone has had a turn at being the judge.

玩家輪流詢問法官一條問題。
法官收集所有問題，然後透過選擇最適合該問題的玩家來回答。
是次判決的贏家會鞠躬，然後該回合便會結束。\每回合結束後會替換擔任法官的玩家。
當所有人都嘗試當法官一次後，遊戲便會結束。

玩家輪流詢問法官一條問題。
法官收集所有問題，然後透過選擇最適合該問題的玩家來回答。
是次判決的贏家會鞠躬，然後該回合便會結束。\每回合結束後會替換擔任法官的玩家。
當所有人都嘗試當法官一次後，遊戲便會結束。
